summary: Contoso Wireless offers nationwide coverage to over 95% of the population in the United States. Customers have access to 24/7 customer support, as well as a variety of tutorials and guides to help them get the most out of their service. In addition to wireless service, Contoso also offers home security systems, smart home solutions, and home automation devices. They offer several discounts and promotions, including loyalty rewards, seasonal sales, and promotional offers. Customers also benefit from exclusive perks such as free access to their mobile app, discounts on partner services, and access to an online community forum.
